quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Based on the sub requirement of replacing the jet ski with a shell-like body that maintains plausible proportions and surface texture, this question evaluates whether the new structure appears structurally coherent and physically rational within the scene. quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Based on the sub requirement of adding coral-like spires across the back of the creature, this question checks if the spires follow natural organic forms and are properly lit by the sunset. quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Based on the sub requirement of modifying the riders into glowing sea guardian spirits, this question assesses whether the glowing effect is localized to the figures and integrates naturally with the ambient light.
